command.title: Balance

command.title: Network Time
command.description: This asks the mobile network to report it's local time. It is mostly only useful to engineers testing the core network.

command.title: Last Caller
command.description: The command is useful as it will return the last dialed number to your mobile even when it's switched off or not in network coverage.
